page.title: 15FAMOUS PEOPLE IN EASTLEIGH
page.content: It was difficult to find one obvious person who has been famous who has links with Eastleigh,but there are many who have helped the town to grow. One was Mr A.H.Quilley who served on the local and county councils for many years he was chairman of the Education Committee and even had a school named after him.He was a Freeman of Eastleigh and went to Buckingham Palace to receive an M.B.E.from the Queen.Mr.N.F Norris also received an M.B.E.from the Queen. He said the day was memorable,the Queen had something special to say to each person,a lot to remember despite an aid at her side, prompting.He was asked not to shake her hand too hard as she shook so many hands each day.Besides breakfast before he left home MR Norris had nothing to eat until he left the palace at about 2'oclock.
